Psychological Definition: Belonging needs pertain to the desire for social connections, friendships, and a sense of community.

Workplace Definition: In the workplace, this translates to a sense of belonging within the team, positive coworker relationships, and a supportive work community.

Leadership Support:
  • Encourage team-building activities and social events.
  • Foster a collaborative and inclusive team culture.
  • Recognize and appreciate team achievements publicly.
  • Address conflicts promptly to maintain a harmonious work environment.
